features: Helps Process Alcohol: Clinically studied Himalaya PartySmart helps support the liver's ability to process alcohol while you sleep, making it an important addition to a fun night out and the day after.* Provides liver support with plant-based herbal ingredients.*

One Capsule for a Better Morning: Wake up with better mood, comfort and energy after a night of drinking.* Capsules are easy to tuck in your purse or your pocket. Take sometime while drinking for best results and incorporate them into your nights out.

Herbal Ingredients: This night out supplement is formulated with Andrographis, Chicory, Grapes and Dates to help eliminate acetaldehyde, a byproduct of alcohol breakdown, from your blood.* Just one capsule makes it happen!
Made with Goodness: Vegetarian formula. No gluten, dairy, corn, soy, dairy or ingredients of animal origin. Non-GMO Project Verified. From a family-owned company trusted since 1930.icacy.

Quality from Start to Finish: Himalaya products are produced in a cGMP (Good Manufacturing Practices) certified facility. Rigorously tested for identity, strength and safety so you can feel confident in the products you use each day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I take a pill before drinking and I can say I don’t wake up with any hangover at all. Works amazing I would highly recommend it. I also feel like I can handle my alcohol way better while I am on it. It’s like it helps the alcohol digest correctly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a night out
reviews.reviewText: So... once I hit my 30s I realized I can't really drink like I used to (probably for the best) but sometimes I like to pretend than I can (for the plot and because I don't learn). This is a great little pill to take to prevent the thunderous hangovers my body rewards me with after a night out. It can't erase any bad decisions but it CAN neutralize those shots you thought were a good idea at the time.I have found that, if taken *while* drinking (not before, not after), and if you drink plenty of water along the way, you can actually wake up hangover free, which is nothing short of a miracle tbh. I've gotten all my friends on it and they all agree that it truly prevents hangovers (although if you have a delicate stomach, you may need to use the bathroom a bit the next morning if you catch my drift... still way better than the shakes and pukes!).Nothing replaces NOT drinking, I realize, but if you want to wake up feeling not crummy, this stuff works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Drinking Pill Ever!
reviews.reviewText: I’m in no way affiliated with this product. It is hands down the best!! This pill will allow you to continue drinking and not feel buzz as fast AND won’t allow you to get a hangover. Moderate and drink responsibly, of course :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product is good but don’t expect a miracle
reviews.reviewText: PartySmart capsules come with the promise of better mornings after a night out, and in many cases, they deliver. The packaging is compact and easy to carry, which is great for on-the-go use. As a vegetarian and non-GMO herbal supplement, it’s a relief to have a product that aligns with my health and ethical standards.Taking the capsule is simple – just one with your first drink, as directed. On evenings with moderate alcohol consumption, I noticed a positive difference the following day. There was a clear feeling of being more refreshed and alert, without the usual grogginess that can follow a social night.However, it’s worth noting that PartySmart has its limits. In situations with stronger spirits or higher quantities of alcohol, the effectiveness of the capsules seemed to wane. They are not a miracle cure and should not be seen as a green light to overindulge.Overall, PartySmart offers a degree of support for your body’s natural response to alcohol, but it’s important to maintain realistic expectations. Responsible drinking should still be the priority, and these capsules can be a supplementary aid for those mindful evenings.
